questions.question_text: "agenda" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A list of topics to be discussed at a meeting
A written summary after a meeting
questions.example_sentence: The organizer shared the meeting agenda one day in advance.
questions.explanation:
議題・会議の進行項目
議事録
通信ツール
業績報告書

questions.question_text: "facilitator" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: A person who helps guide and manage discussions
questions.example_sentence: The facilitator ensured that all participants had a chance to speak.
questions.explanation:
進行役・促進者
書記
予算承認者
技術支援システム

questions.question_text: "efficient" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: Achieving results with minimal wasted time or effort
questions.example_sentence: Clear agendas help make meetings more efficient.
questions.explanation:
効率的な
複雑な
遅延した
雑談中心の

questions.question_text: "accountability" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: Responsibility for completing tasks or decisions
questions.example_sentence: Sharing action items increases accountability among team members.
questions.explanation:
責任・説明責任
協働方法
研修
会議管理システム

questions.question_text: "discretion" の意味はどれでしょう？
choices_text: The freedom to decide what should be done in a situation
questions.example_sentence: Managers may reschedule meetings at their discretion.
questions.explanation:
裁量・判断の自由
厳格な規則
見積方法
必須承認手続き
